title: 32% update.
body:
Every single time rito updated LoL for a new patch it goes fine untill 32% and then it just says "Update Failed Unspecific Error" this hasnt happened once but for the last 10 patches and everytime i have to uninstall and reinstall the entire game, I dont get how it wont let me update a patch properly but itll let me reinstall the entire game without a problem.




Offtopic but spell it out.

replies.body:
I get the exact same thing. The only solution I've found is reinstalling the game every time.

Gets really frustrating when a 2mb hot-fix is released and I have to wait a few hours to redownload the entire game.

I'm still highly suspecting that it's because they haven't redone the coding for Windows 8.

If you do find a solution, could you tell me, please?

Hey ViceVersaxD,

I am sorry you are experiencing this problem. I have personally experienced this issue myself once before and found it was due to my firewall/Anti Virus software blocking the patch from updating correctly (I'm not saying this is the case for you, but my own personal experience).

Have you contacted Player Support in the past and completed some testing with them?
